alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 3:45PM AKST until December 27 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and Freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches north of Talkeetna, with locally higher amounts of up to 10 inches near Cantwell. Ice accumulations up to one quarter of an inch from Talkeetna south. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous. Ice accumulation may cause downed power lines and falling tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will remain near and south of Talkeetna. Precipitation will remain mostly snow north of Talkeetna. Precipitation will lighten up this evening and begin to transition back to snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
